p.k: Crime, Drama, Romance, Classic, Art Usa (1949). Hrají: Ingrid Bergman, Joseph Cotton, Michael Wilding. Režie: Alfred Hitchcock.
p.d: In 1831, Irishman Charles Adare travels to Australia to start a new life with the help of his cousin who has just been appointed governor. When he arrives he meets powerful landowner and ex-convict Sam Flusky, who wants to do a business deal with him. Whilst attending a dinner party at Flusky's house, Charles meets Flusky's wife Henrietta who he had known as a child back in Ireland. Henrietta is an alcoholic and seems to be on the verge of madness.
